description_for_human: AI-powered travel planning assistant that creates personalized itineraries, finds hotels, and helps plan trips worldwide.
description_for_model: Blubeez is an AI travel planning service. Users can chat with the AI assistant 'blu' to plan trips, create day-by-day itineraries, search for hotels on Booking.com, discover destinations, and get personalized travel recommendations. The service supports trip planning to 190+ countries with features including interactive maps, hotel booking integration, trip saving, and wishlists. The AI understands natural language requests like 'Plan me a 5-day trip to Bali' and responds with complete travel plans.
